original_text: Then Eliakim son of Hilkiah the palace administrator, Shebna the secretary and Joah son of Asaph the recorder went to Hezekiah, with their clothes torn, and told him what the field commander had said.
korean_text: 그 때에 힐기야의 아들 왕궁 맡은 자 엘리아김과 서기관 셉나와 아삽의 아들 사관 요아가 자기의 옷을 찢고 히스기야에게 나아가서 랍사게의 말을 그에게 전하니라

sentences.original_text: Then Eliakim son of Hilkiah the palace administrator
and Joah son of Asaph the recorder
and told him what the field commander had said
sentences.korean_translation: 군대 지휘관이 말한 것을 그에게 보고했다
